saved_posts.description: Macdonough Drive pump stations CSO #002 below the falls in Vergennes

Calvary Cemetery - CSO #1, & Meadow Street - CSO #4 through Third Base structure. Flow volume and duration data pending, events still in progress. Other locations may also be affected if heavy rain events continue later in the day.
In order of occurance:Meadow Street CSO#004School Street CSO#003Homeplate CSO#002Calvary3 CSO#001
